basics.name: Guillaume Kuc
basics.label: Technical Artist
basics.summary: I'm a technical artist with expertise spanning 2D & 3D digital arts, music composition, and scripting & tools development. With formal education in 3D Animation from École Estienne in Paris, I've cultivated a multidisciplinary identity that reconciles my artistic aspirations with my analytical orientation. My experience includes creating interactive 3D maps, developing workflow automation tools, painting digital illustrations, and publishing educational content. Lately, I've focused on deepening my technical art skills in service of the French creative industries which I care for.

work.summary: Created interactive 3D maps for clients in mall, office, hospital, and university sectors while developing automation tools to improve workflow efficiency.
highlights: Created high-quality interactive 3D indoor maps for enterprise clients (Orange, Loréal, SG, Lombard Odier, Engie, Unibail, Ikea, etc...)
Developed and integrated workflow automation plugins that improved team efficiency
Utilized VisioMapEditor, Blender, AutoCAD, Illustrator, Figma, Vue.js, SVG, Paper.js

work.summary: Created architectural, landscape and cover illustrations for tabletop RPG companies and novelists (intermittent).
highlights: Worked with clients including La Plume de Cyrano and Orygins
Created colored illustrations for projects like Tylestel and Aegyptius
Received positive feedback for composition, color choices, and atmospheric quality

work.summary: Worked at multiple supermarket chains across France while maintaining self-directed learning projects.
highlights: Managed cashier, shelving, accounting tasks, and store opening/closing responsibilities
Used free time blocks for portfolio development and personal projects
Maintained positive cash flow while building skills in digital art, 3D animation, and music theory
1.5 years of cumulated XP in Retail

work.summary: Tasked with developing of a 3D promotional short film for a ceramics brand for a freelance graphic designer
highlights: Produced pre-prod work, 3D models and animations for promotional content
Too short for intended scope

work.summary: Created pre-production design materials for film projects in a small production company, supporting the pitching process for potential funding.
highlights: Designed promotional booklets, and pitch materials for film project funding presentations
Designed logos and visual identity elements for production projects
Collaborated with multiple stakeholders to reach consensual design decisions

publications.name: Gridz - Perspective Plugin for Photoshop
publications.summary: Developed a Photoshop plugin that helps artists create accurate perspective grids with customizable orientation in 3D space. Built with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Photoshop Extension SDK. Implemented trigonometric transformations for perspective calculation and created an intuitive UI for manipulating 3D space parameters.
highlights: Developed using JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Photoshop Extension SDK
Implemented bottom-up trigonometric transformations for accurate perspective calculation
Created intuitive UI for manipulating 3D space parameters
Published commercially on Gumroad

publications.name: All-fourths Tuning, Improvisation - E-book
publications.summary: Self-published educational e-book teaching guitarists how to use all-fourths tuning for enhanced improvisation. Created comprehensive diagrams explaining music theory concepts and developed a systematic approach to learning modes and scales in all-fourths tuning. Achieved 4.1 star average rating.
highlights: Created comprehensive diagrams and explanations of music theory concepts
Developed systematic approach to learning modes and scales in all-fourths tuning
Published on Amazon Kindle with 4.1 star average rating

publications.name: The Encyclopaedist - Animated Short Film
publications.summary: Created a 3-minute animated short film as diploma project at École Estienne. Handled all production stages including storyboarding, modeling, animation, lighting, and rendering. Collaborated with composer Pierre Fontaine for musical score. Selected for screening at multiple international film festivals.

projects.name: Technical Art Skills Development
projects.description: Self-directed gap year focused on enhancing technical art capabilities through specific skill development and personal projects.
highlights: Procedural modeling in Houdini
Game engines: Unreal Engine/Unity
Python, C# and C++ scripting languages
Procedural texturing in Substance Designer
Shaders development
Custom tools development for Blender, Unreal, Maya
